features: 100% Organic Cotton Cloths for Baby. One Time Use cotton cloths. Large and super absorbent, these organic cotton cloths are the perfect chemical-free alternative to baby wet wipes.Wet the cloth with warm water and wipe your baby's diaper area. Use another cloth to pat dry.

Made by parents for Parents and their Baby! Coco Fluff Soft Bottom Cloths are 100% Certified organic cotton from sustainable sources, which means good for you and good for the environment. Cotton is chlorine free, lint-free, organic, and perfect for your babies most sensitive areas.

Make these Extra thick, Extra Large Cotton Pads your new favorite changing table accessory. Also, a perfect bathtime accessory. Gently wipe to clean your babies face, back of ears, and other sensitive body parts. Works great at drying those hard to reach areas too!

Larger and thicker for better coverage. Unfold the cloth for a maximum width of 8". Long enough for your entire palm. 3.5" x 3.75 pad when folded. Comes in packs of 100, 200 and 300 cloths. A thicker and more absorbent pad will be better for you and your baby! Safely and quickly cleans even the biggest messes with relative ease.
Good for baby is also good for Mommy. Moms can use these cloths too! Use for makeup application and removal and general skincare applications. Perfect for Moms skin too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: The package looks great but the cloths aren’t how I imaged at allI bought it to use to wipe my baby but sadly when I wet these with water it isnt goodI wouldn’t recommend if u are getting it for baby dry wipes in my opinion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Read all the descriptions and features before buying
reviews.reviewText: I believe these to be reusable cloth diapers because I did not say otherwise on the packaging. I found out the hard way.And upon looking more closely at the descriptions featured way below the Amazon listing, it says one time use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars FYI These are not cloth..
reviews.reviewText: I was searching for cloth wipes for my baby and came across these. They are DISPOSABLE cotton pads like cotton balls. Don't get fooled like I did.
